articles.title: Global economy faces tougher year in 2023, IMF's Georgieva warns - CNA
articles.description: For much of the global economy, 2023 is going to be a tough year as the main engines of global growth - the United States, Europe and China - all experience weakening activity, the head of the International Monetary Fund said on Sunday (Jan 1). The new year i…

articles.author: YUKI IWAMURA, Agence France-Presse
articles.title: World steps into 2023 after turbulent year - GMA News Online
articles.description: The world's eight billion people have been ushering in 2023, bidding farewell to a turbulent year marked by war in Europe, stinging price rises, Lionel Messi's World Cup glory and the deaths of Queen Elizabeth, Pele and former pope Benedict.
